item.description:
***It appears that we may get rain around 6 pm. I would still like to hike but earlier. By midday the trails should dry a bit. Please update your RSVP accordingly. Sorry for the change. It's in the interest of safety.***

For some reason I have the urge to hike. After a morning run with Zeus, I'm sure CoCo will want to go out. Why not oblige?

Nothing overly organized, just some play time for her. I'm thinking of something around 1.5 hours at a moderate pace with plenty of ups and downs.

Sorry for the late posting but I just thought about it. This all assumes the weather holds out for Sunday.
item.how_to_find_us: I own a green Chevy Pickup
item.name: Sundays Are Made for Hiking.
